name: Grandpa Comes to Visit
description: It is 1956, you play as Miriam, a spry 7-year old who's birthday is rapidly approaching. Her grandfather has unexpectedly come to visit, yet he has locked himself in the guest bedroom and has not responded to Miriam's questions. Her parents don't seem to mind. One fateful day, Miriam's grandfather has asked Miriam to bring him food...
